Text:
Thanks for the uncensored T&J - I didn't even know they had been censored. 

However, when I try to play them, I just get audio - even on the net-player VLC (which usually gets the needed codecs from the net).
G-spot just tells me "no codec installed", bot not what codec's missing and where to get it.
Can you help? Thanx.
It's normal VCD-compatible MPEG-1, so it's odd that you're having problems viewing it. Try using dedicated DVD player software, it's supposed to be able play VCD as well.
Your wish is granted. Now download like you mean it.
Thank you friend.  I'm about to finish but it looks like I'm the only peer.  Hope this great torrent doesn't die!  I'll hold on to it for a while in case any new peers appear.
